name: Il Panino di Brutto Sogno
description:
A pattern matching puzzle game made for Wizard Jam 6, based on the title of Important if True 13 -"Veggie" Panino and the Nightmare Puzzler

Take on orders from customers as they come in.  Select the series of ingredients in the order from left to right, though ingredients stacked vertically can be done done in any order. Drag a single line orthogonally from the beginning to the end of the order to complete it and earn points. If your to slow however, the customers will curse you and leave in disgust. Three failed orders in a row results in a loss.

I wrote the text and menus in Italian to better fit the theme, but I don't speak a word of it so I am sorry. Also, the music is computer generated using WolframTones to make up for my inability to compose.

Created With: Unity, Inkscape, WolframTones

Special thanks: My sister for all of the Italian, and the rest of my family for brainstorming and playtesting.
